law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Fund" means the Circuit Court Real Property Records Improvement Fund.

"Recordable instrument" means:
A deed, as defined in § 1-101 of the Real Property Article; and
Any other instrument affecting property that may be recorded under § 3-102 of the Real Property Article.
